==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|りょ|こう}}

===Etymology===
{{IPAchar|/rjokau/}} → {{IPAchar|/rjokɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/rjokoː/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=りょこう}} compound {{m|zh|旅行|tr=ljo<sup>X</sup> hæng|lit=to travel + to walk}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|hak|-}} reading ''lî-hàng'', {{etyl|nan|-}} readings ''lí-hêng'', ''lú-hêng''.

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|りょこう|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りょこう|hhira=りょかう}}

# [[travel]], a [[trip]], a [[journey]], a [[voyage]], a [[tour]]
#: {{ja-usex|夏休みには'''旅行'''に行こう。|^なつやすみ に は '''りょこう''' に いこう。|Let's go on a '''trip''' for summer vacation.}}

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|旅館|りょかん}}: a traditional Japanese [[inn]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|りょこう|hhira=りょかう|tr=intrans}}

# to [[travel]], to [[journey]], to go on a [[trip]], to go for a [[voyage]], to [[tour]]
#: {{ja-usex|彼は家族と'''旅行'''したいようだ。|^かれ は かぞく と '''りょこう''' したい よう だ。|It seems that he wants to '''travel''' with his family.}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|linkto=旅|旅する|たび する}}: to [[tour]], to [[travel]], to go on a [[trip]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|りょこう}}

===See also===
